rationale: Chaca chaca is widespread occurring in the Ganges-Brahmaputra river drainages.  Although there have been indications of population declines in some parts of its range due to over-exploitation for the aquarium trade, it is not threatened in all of its range, hence it is at present assessed as Least Concern.  However, monitoring and educational work within the ornamental fish trade is required.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Datta, N.C., Dey, S.C. & Allen, D.J.
